trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> object that can be connected anywhere to a parent visual tree.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> objetos que podem ser ligados em qualquer local para uma árvore visual principal.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HostVisual"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.HostVisual"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Implements HitTestCore to supply base hit testing behavior (returning <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Implementa HitTestCore para fornecer o comportamento de teste de acessos de base (devolver <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestParameters"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> never reports itself as being hit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual>nunca comunica propriamente dito que está a ser atingido.</xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual>

trans-unit.source: To change this behavior, create a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar este comportamento, crie uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual>e substituir a <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryHitTestResult.VisualHit*> property contains the visual that was hit.
Implements HitTestCore to supply base hit testing behavior (returning <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters"></xref>).
trans-unit.target: Implementa HitTestCore para fornecer o comportamento de teste de acessos de base (devolver <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PointHitTestParameters"> </xref>).

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> never reports itself as being hit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual>nunca comunica propriamente dito que está a ser atingido.</xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual>

trans-unit.source: To change this behavior, create a class derived from <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual> and override the <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: Para alterar este comportamento, crie uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual>e substituir a <xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A>métodos.</xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual.HitTestCore%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.HostVisual>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit*> property contains the visual object that was hit.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit*>propriedade contém o objeto visual que foi atingido.</xref:System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult.VisualHit*>
